name: Thrown Away
description:
!!!! This game is currently in development !!!!

This game is being made for the Coolest Jam, a jam with a duration of 48 hours spread over two months.

The theme of the jam is "mini open-world".
(Thanks to Alexandre from Haunted tie for the great theme btw!)

Thrown Away is about someone who was send to exile inside a planet, his purpose is to join the center of it. He was tied to a ball which keeps him on the outer edge of the planet, thus he must break it.

Gameplay wise, your only actions are to grab and throw the ball, there'll be living creatures which you'll need to smash in order to lighten/weigh down the ball, which will affect the way the player moves (and other things).

Made in collaboration with Julien Gysen
